revisions.rev:
{{refimprove|date=September 2009}} {{Infobox Software | name = KPackage | logo = [[Image:Crystal Clear app kpackage.png|48px]] | screenshot = [[Image:Kpackage 3.5.5.png|250px]] | caption = Screenshot of KPackage | developer = Toivo Pedaste | operating_system = [[Unix-like]] | genre = [[Package management]] | license = [[GNU General Public License|GPL]] | website = [http://www.general.uwa.edu.au/u/toivo/kpackage/ www.general.uwa.edu.au/u/toivo/kpackage] }} '''KPackage''' was [[KDE]]'s [[package manager]] [[frontend]]. It supported [[BSD]], [[deb (file format)|Debian]], [[Gentoo Linux|Gentoo]], [[RPM Package Manager|RPM]] and Slackware packages. It provided a GUI for the management and upgrade of existing packages and the installation and acquirement of new packages. Additionally, it provided functionality to help manage package caches.
KPackage was part of [[kdeadmin]], and was developed at KDE.org.[http://websvn.kde.org/trunk/KDE/kdeadmin/kpackage/ Websvn.kde.org] The successor of KPackage will be Shaman2.[http://drfav.wordpress.com/2009/12/01/introducing-shaman-a-new-universal-package-management-frontend/ Drfav.wordpress.com] == See also == * [[Adept Manager]] * [[PackageKit]] * [[Synaptic (software)]] * [[Ubuntu Software Center]] ==References== {{Reflist}} == External links == * [http://userbase.kde.org/KPackage KPackage user wiki] {{KDE}} [[Category:KDE software]] [[Category:Linux PMS graphical front-ends]] {{Install-software-stub}} {{KDE-stub}} [[ar:ÙÙÙ Ø¨Ø§ÙØ¬]] [[es:KPackage]] [[it:KPackage]] [[pl:KPackage]] [[uk:KPackage]]
